long_description: New from Park Tool, the Emergency tire boot is the fastest, easiest, and most secure way to repair a cut or worn sidewall. Strong, waterproof vinyl membrane with fiber weave reinforcement patches the sidewall until tire can be replaced. Pressure sensitive adhesive assures the boot stays in place. Measures 3 x 1.75 in. Small size and light weight mean there's no excuse not to have an Emergency tire boot in your saddle bag.
